jump_scares.spoiler: A ghost flashes on screen before the title card shows up
As John reaches towards a clock, a very loud noise comes from the radio
The screen fades out, followed by a cut to a moving truck’s door loudly opening a few seconds later which might startle some viewers
Jonathan’s phone suddenly goes off during a quiet scene
While Jonathan is driving without paying attention to the road, there is a cut to a car honking at him
The lights flicker and a trio of ghastly silhouettes appear behind Jonathan
There is a cut to loud static as Jonathan flips a page
A ghost unexpectedly flashes on the screen and jumps straight at the camera
A truck passes by in front of the camera while honking
As Jonathan leans into the screen, it suddenly cuts from static to a woman jumping at the screen
Jonathan looks in through the car window and nothing is visible in the dark. Suddenly, a woman jumps at the glass and screams
There is a loud cut to static
The hallway lights begin to flicker as Jonathan leans into the bathroom sink, and three trio of ghosts suddenly appear
A dark figure walks by infront of the camera
Sarah quickly turns to her side, and the camera quickly pans and then cuts to black accompanied by a loud sound
